Package.Name: Strike
Package.Description:
Introducing a completely new sight for people with poor eyesight, Strike sight is designed specifically for casual gamers. Bright green color contrasting looks on all maps of the game. 

Features:
-Shows the distance to the target
-Recharge time
-The strength of your tank
-Shows the thickness of enemy armor
-Animation recharge

Package.Name: HARDscope by Andrey-Hard and KobkaG
Package.Description:
- Sights contain 14 historical sighting grids of the USSR, Germany, the United States and one grid of France
- The choice of sighting grids is carried out through the game menu in combat.
- The blackout is embedded in the sniper scope and its transparency is adjusted through the settings menu
- The sight contains information: 
- Digital Rangefinder (Distance to Target)
- Timer and Recharge Time
- Strength indicator in% (CP)
- Indicator of ammunition
- Animation of the projectile during recharging.

Package.Name: WoWp
Package.Description: Author: Andre_V

Package.Name: Gun Constraints for SPG and Artillery (Type set in garage)
Package.Description: Needed by all those who play tanks with limited horizontal guidance angles - self-propelled guns and tank destroyers. \r\nBy installing this mod indicators will be added on the sides of the sight in your combat interface, which will show you the boundaries to which you can rotate the barrel.
Package.UpdateComment: 2019-08-08: using protankis gunconstraints from protanki modpack
